name: Sushi Packer
description:
Sushi Packer is a student project created during my Cert IV at TAFE.

Play as a new employee at a sushi packing place as you are tasked with putting any sushi that comes through on the conveyor into the correct tray, once you complete a tray put it back on the conveyor. Don’t let any unpacked sushi through the other end of the conveyor.

Due to the everlasting procedural nature of the game, it will constantly get harder and harder.

Inspired by an episode of Drake and Josh.
